{{also|Bitte}} ==French== ===Etymology=== From {{etyl|non|fr}} {{m|non|biti||beam, girder}}, from {{der|fr|gem-pro|*bitô}}, from {{der|fr|ine-pro|*bʰeyd-||to split}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{fr-IPA}} * {{audio|fr|Fr-bitte.ogg|audio}} ===Noun=== {{fr-noun|f}} # {{lb|fr|nautical}} [[bitt]], [[bollard]], [[mooring post]] # {{lb|fr|slang}} {{alternative spelling of|fr|bite}}; [[cock]], [[dick]], [[prick]] ====Descendants==== * {{desc|it|bitta|bor=1}} {{see desc}} ===See also=== * {{l|fr|bite}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:TLFi}} ===Anagrams=== * {{l|fr|Tibet}} ---- ==German== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈbɪtə/}} * {{audio|de|De-bitte.ogg}} * {{audio|de|De-bitte-2.ogg}} ===Adverb=== {{head|de|adverb}} # [[please]], if you please {{gloss|''used to make a polite request or affirm an offer''}} ===Interjection=== {{head|de|interjection}} # [[you're welcome]] {{gloss|''acknowledgement of thanks''}} # [[excuse me]], [[sorry]] {{gloss|''request to repeat information''}} # [[here you are]] {{gloss|''when handing something over to someone''}} # {{lb|de|sarcastic}} [[OK]] [[then]], [[well]] then, [[all right]] {{gloss|''indication of mock acquiescence to someone's apparent demanding attitude''}} ====Synonyms==== * {{sense|you're welcome}} {{l|de|bitte schön}}, {{l|de|gern geschehen}} ====See also==== * {{l|de|danke}} ===Verb=== {{head|de|verb form}} # {{de-verb form of|bitten|1|s|g}} # {{de-verb form of|bitten|1|s|k1}} # {{de-verb form of|bitten|3|s|k1}} # {{de-verb form of|bitten|i|s}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} [[Category:German phrasebook]] ---- ==Italian== ===Noun=== {{head|it|noun plural form|g=f}} # {{plural of|it|bitta}} ---- ==Turkish== ===Noun=== {{head|tr|noun form}} # {{inflection of|tr|bit||loc|s}}
